mapper.sql: fav_id, user_id, fav_type, target_id, opr, opr_time
mapper.select: select a.*, b.key_name as favTypeName, c.user_name as userName from favorites_info a left join dics_info b on a.fav_type=b.key_value and b.key_code='FTYPE' left join user_info c on a.user_id=c.code

select a.*, b.key_name as favTypeName, c.code as userName from favorites_info a left join dics_info b on a.fav_type=b.key_value and b.key_code='FTYPE' left join user_info c on a.user_id=c.code where fav_id = #{favId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into favorites_info
fav_id,
user_id,
fav_type,
target_id,
opr,
opr_time,
code,
#{favId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{favType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update favorites_info
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fav_type = #{favType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
opr = #{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where fav_id = #{favId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update favorites_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fav_type = #{favType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opr = #{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fav_id = #{favId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
